items.metataghtml: <meta name="description" content="Walker Tape®’s Bond Breaker Shampoo is the most important part of preparing for an install.">
items.storedetaileddescription: Walker Tape®’s Bond Breaker Shampoo is the most important part of preparing for an install. It breaks down adhesive residue, exfoliates the scalp, and helps improve hold times. Use Bond Breaker Shampoo after hair system removal and before the next install. This product is not for daily use. Keep the product away from heat, humidity, and light. Store in a well-ventilated, cool, dark, dry, room-temperature controlled environment (60-80°F). Close bottle lids tightly. With proper storage, our liquid products have a shelf life of up to six months.
items.outofstockbehavior: Allow back orders with no out-of-stock message
items.featureddescription:
Not for daily use. Close lid tightly. Do not apply to broken, cut, or irritated skin. External use only, do not ingest. Avoid eye contact. Keep out of reach of children. Test on a small area before use.

 

Store in a well-ventilated, cool, dark, dry, room-temperature controlled environment (60-80°F). SDS sheet is available below.
items.displayname: Bond Breaker Shampoo - 10 fl oz, Flip Top
items.storedisplayname2: Bond Breaker Shampoo - 10 fl oz, Flip-Top
items.storedescription:
We recommend performing a patch test before use.

 

  1. Apply a small amount to the hair and scalp.
  2. Rub in as normal shampoo but focus on the adhesive areas. This product will break down adhesive bonds and clean up residue on the hair and scalp.
  3. Rinse like a normal shampoo and repeat if necessary.
items.pagetitle: Bond Breaker Shampoo - 10 fl oz, Flip-Top | Walker Tape
